name: Firefox Speed Dial rounded clean style
description: Inspired a little on Opera dials. This style is for Firefox addon "Speed Dial" (https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/speed-dial/). It has rounded borders and hover background color frame effect. Optimized for who has a lot of dials.
additional_info:
11.01.2011 - Added option to user select position of dials title, above or bellow thumbnail; See screenshot.
10.19.2011 - Added screenshots: New style, hover effect and original speed dial.
10.18.2011 - Initial release.
